greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Regular triangle where T(n,k) is the number of orderless same-trees of weight n with k leaves.
comment: An orderless same-tree of weight n > 0 is either a single node of weight n, or a finite multiset of two or more orderless same-trees whose weights are all the same and sum to n.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275 (rows 1..50)
program: S(g, k)={polcoef(exp(sum(i=1, k, x^i*subst(g, y, y^i)/i) + O(x*x^k)), k)}
A(n)={my(v=vector(n)); for(n=1, n, v[n] = y + sumdiv(n, d, S(v[n/d], d))); apply(p -> Vecrev(p/y), v)}
xref: Last entries of each row give A289079. Row sums are A289078.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Mar 19 2018
